mapper.select: select users.user_idx, class_idx, user_status, class_joindate, user_name, user_email, user_role from user_class, users where class_idx = #{class_idx} and user_class.user_idx = users.user_idx
mapper.update: update user_class set user_status = 'accept', class_joindate = sysdate where user_idx = #{h} and class_idx = #{h2}
mapper.delete: delete from user_class where user_idx = #{h} and class_idx = #{h2}
